name: Cupcakewalk!
description:
Controls 

Left Arrow - Move Left
Right Arrow - Move Right

Dev Updates

Info

Cupcakewalk is a mini baking fetch quest. It's our first piece of interactive content for Mini Jam, a 72-hour game jam. (more info) . Theme: Baking
